name: Premiere Pro Project
summary: Learn about .PRPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Adobe Premiere Pro is a professional video editing application for creating feature films, broadcasts, and other video presentations. When saving a project in Premiere Pro, the application creates a PRPROJ file to store the contents.

PRPROJ files store references to media assets (video, audio, graphics); they do not store the actual media data in the file itself. The references to these media assets are created when you import the asset into your project. Therefore, if you move the asset after importing it, Premiere Pro will not be able to locate the asset for the project, which will prompt you to relocate the asset.

To create a PRPROJ file, select File → New → Project..., modify your project, then select File → Save or Save As.... Once you save the PRPROJ file, you can close it, re-open it, then continue editing the project.

instructions:
To open a PRPROJ file in Adobe Premiere Pro, follow these steps:

Open Adobe Premiere Pro.Select “File” > “Open Project” from the menu.Navigate to the location of the PRPROJ file you want to open.Select the PRPROJ file and click “Open.”The project will be loaded into Adobe Premiere Pro and all of the elements, including video and audio clips, transitions, effects, and timeline and sequence settings, will be available for editing.
You can open PRPROJ files with Adobe Premiere Pro (Windows and macOS). To open a PRPROJ file, select File → Open Project....
You can also import PRPROJ files into Adobe After Effects. To import a PRPROJ file, select File → Import → Import Adobe Premiere Pro Project....
You can convert PRPROJ files to many file formats with Adobe Premiere Pro by selecting File → Export. Some of the formats include:
